text:
<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The brothers, Jason and JimBob, often confide in each other.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Ben, JohnBoy and Jason are brothers.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy, :Jason .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben, :Jason .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben, :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The brothers, JohnBoy and Jason were born just a year apart, yet their personalities couldn't be more different. [/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The eldest brother, Ben, had a love of music, while his younger brother, JohnBoy, preferred studying math.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Ben was known for his outgoing nature and knack for leadership, while his younger brother,Jason, was the quieter one, preferring solitude and introspection.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. If there was anything that could be said about the boys, JohnBoy and JimBob, was that their sibling bond was strong.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. While Ben and JohnBoy sometimes had knock down fights, the brothers were each other's biggest defenders.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason and JohnBoy both loved football. And while they both excelled at competitive sports, the two brothers excelled more at competing against one another.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. When they were younger, both Jason and JohnBoy shared all of their toys, including an extensive comic book collection. But when Jason went off to college, he left his younger brother to what he considered were more childish pursuits.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Both Jason and JimBob liked swimming, but only JimBob swam competitively. Jason preferred not to compete, especially if that meant competing against his little brother.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason was the oldest of the Brown sons, and JimBob was the youngest.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>
